name: FileWrapper.ReadingOptions
desc: Reading options that can be set by the init(url:options:) and read(from:options:) methods.

items.name: static var immediate: FileWrapper.ReadingOptions
items.desc: The option to read files immediately after creating a file wrapper.

items.name: static var withoutMapping: FileWrapper.ReadingOptions
items.desc: Whether file mapping for regular file wrappers is disallowed.
